mapper.insert: insert into basket(userId, productId, productName, productPrice, productCount, productImg, matchFoodIdList, matchFoodCount, total) values(#{userId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productCount}, #{productImg}, #{matchFoodIdList}, #{matchFoodCount}, #{total})
mapper.select: select count(*) from basket where userId = #{userId}
select * from basket where userId = #{userId} order by basketId desc
select sum(productPrice) from basket where userId = #{userId}
select price from matchFood where matchFoodId = #{matchFoodId}
